title: Mini-Ep 132: Scents And Sensibility
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 132: Scents And Sensibility
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree spritz on some perfume and discuss Kate’s “barely there” makeup products, Doree’s new book cover, holidays that bring unexpected emotions, and how to stay motivated while working out from home. Plus, they get a smudge-proof eye pencil re...
description:
Kate and Doree spritz on some perfume and discuss Kate’s “barely there” makeup products, Doree’s new book cover, holidays that bring unexpected emotions, and how to stay motivated while working out from home. Plus, they get a smudge-proof eye pencil recc from a former Sephora employee!


Activity/Word of the Day: Watch the AOC Vogue Beauty Secrets video, of course! 


We’re breaking down the best cleansers and want to know your favorite. Tell us here!


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • H&C ANIMAL HEALTH - For $3 off your order visit yourpetsdailydose.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • DAILY HARVEST - Go to daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FOREVER35 to get $25 off your first box.
  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.
  • OXICLEAN - To Work your Magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TRYME and order a free sample.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
